thread.title: AIDE TO THE NATION’S CAPITAL HOMELESS COMES WITH GREAT GRACE
thread.title_full: AIDE TO THE NATION’S CAPITAL HOMELESS COMES WITH GREAT GRACE

author: prbuzz.com
title: AIDE TO THE NATION’S CAPITAL HOMELESS COMES WITH GREAT GRACE
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Contact: Carolyn Givens
Tel. 301-322-1213
Email: This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
Date: October 14, 2015
Great Grace Church announces O Give Thanks Thanksgiving Benefit Concert – Sunday November 15th
Upper Marlboro, Maryland – Great Grace Church’s REJOICE Young Adult Choir invites family and friends to the “O Give Thanks” Thanksgiving Benefit Concert, an evening dedicated to electrifying praise and worship all to benefit the Washington DC Metro Area Homeless Community.
Scheduled for Sunday, November 15, 2015 beginning at 5pm at Greater Saint John Church, 11425 Old Marlboro Pike, Upper Marlboro Maryland; we will come together alongside Pastor Jeremiah Murphy (National Recording Artist), our facilitator for the evening; National Recording Artists, Maurette Brown Clark , and Jekalyn Carr as special guests. Local aspiring artists and music ministers to include: James Hillian Jr. & H.E ; Tynette Pierre , Ciara T Parker and as an added treat, Greater Saint John's CrazeePraize Nation will visually welcome your praise and thanks.
Tickets are only $20.00 in advance ($25.00 at the door) for general admission. VIP seating for $30.00 is also available. Group tickets: Every ten (10) General Admissions tickets purchased, you get one (1) free. Some of the proceeds from this concert will be used to provide meals/assistance during the holiday season for the less fortunate in the Washington DC Metro Area.
The question remains, “What are you grateful for?” and when one ponders the answer, the objective for purpose and aiding others is made crystal clear. Great Grace Church brings this simple task to the forefront of your mind before the holiday season officially starts.
About Great Grace Church
Great Grace Church, founded in 1983 as then The Holy People for Christ Church, by Pastor Varice O Smallwood, was and has continued to be the site of many miracles and great transformation. With great determination, for over 30 years, Great Grace Church’s faith has increased to the point that God is able to work miracles in our lives so we can give Him More glory. To learn more visit ogivethanks.eventbrite.com , or call us at 301-322-1213.
 ###
